recipesJson.name: Lava flow ðŸŒ‹ by naked remix
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description:
FW strawberry- this is my favorite strawberry. Was an obvious choice after tasting this be liquid. No doubt in my mind flavor West. I'm certain you could substitute the CAP sweet strawberry, JF sweet strawberry ,or 2-1 combination TFA strawberry, strawberry ripe.

CAP golden pineapple- this is a great flavor and was my first choice. Nailed it ðŸ˜ƒðŸ˜ƒðŸ˜ƒ.

FLV sweet coconut &  FA coconut- this is where I think my remix is better than the original. I'm certain they are not using FLV, probably TFA. Adding FA coconut makes the coconut more complex, and realistic. Besides I could not resist, this is hands-down my favorite coconut!! (tends to fade a little overtime.)

CAP super sweet- if I was going for a one-to-one clone this would probably be a much higher percentage. Just a Touch does make everything a little sweeter.

reviews.text: Hey Chris, This stuff is the best! Thanks for sharing

I had to sub the FW strawberry with JF sweet strawberry. I've had the original and think this is very close.  With the FW it's probably even closer, but I wasn't really crazy about the original anyways.  Off the shake, I like this much more.
Definitely an under-rated recipe. Very good. Thanks Chris
so good.   been vaping this 120ml at a time.  sometimes i add some koolada and its super refreshing.  Never had the real lava flow but this is a killer recipe

made exact steeped 3 days. superb mix and better than the original because the coconut doesnâ€™t taste like sunscreen in your version. recipe remains clear after a steep and has become one of my ADVâ€™s. 5/5 stars. mix this up, you will not regret.

Wow, this is very tasty. I was originally mixing this for my wife and did not think this was something I would like. I typically do not like coconut or pineapple in any ejuice, however upon first taste I changed my mind. Great combination of flavors and I'm with you on loving FW Strawberry, I overlooked it for a couple of years since no one really used it but then I was trying to recreate a strawberry custard and realized that was the strawberry that I was looking for. Well done!
Never had the original but this was really tasty!
